member.name: IMFTimedText.AddDataSource
member.param: A pointer to the interface for the data source to add.
Null-terminated wide-character string that contains the label of the data source.
Null-terminated wide-character string that contains the language of the data source.
A -typed value that specifies the kind of timed-text track.
Specifies whether to add the default data source. Specify TRUE to add the default data source or FALSE otherwise.
Receives a pointer to the unique identifier for the added track.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText.AddDataSourceFromUrl
member.summary: Adds a timed-text data source from the specified URL.
member.param: The URL of the timed-text data source.
Null-terminated wide-character string that contains the label of the data source.
Null-terminated wide-character string that contains the language of the data source.
A -typed value that specifies the kind of timed-text track.
Specifies whether to add the default data source. Specify TRUE to add the default data source or FALSE otherwise.
Receives a pointer to the unique identifier for the added track.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText.GetActiveTracks
member.summary: Gets the list of active timed-text tracks in the timed-text component.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface that can enumerate the list of active timed-text tracks.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText.GetCueTimeOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset to the cue time.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the offset to the cue time.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText.GetMetadataTracks
member.summary: Gets the list of the timed-metadata tracks in the timed-text component.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface that can enumerate the list of the timed-metadata tracks.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText.GetTextTracks
member.summary: Gets the list of all the timed-text tracks in the timed-text component.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface that can enumerate the list of all of the timed-text tracks.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText.GetTracks
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all timed-text tracks registered with the .
member.param: Receives a pointer to track list.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText.IsInBandEnabled
member.summary: Determines whether inband mode is enabled.
member.returns: Returns whether inband mode is enabled. If TRUE, inband mode is enabled. If FALSE, inband mode is disabled.

member.name: IMFTimedText.RegisterNotifications
member.param: A pointer to the interface for the timed-text notify object to register.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText.RemoveTrack
member.summary: Removes the timed-text track with the specified identifier.
member.param: The identifier of the track to remove.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText.SelectTrack
member.summary: Selects or deselects a track of text in the timed-text component.
member.param: The identifier of the track to select.
Specifies whether to select or deselect a track of text. Specify TRUE to select the track or FALSE to deselect the track.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText.SetCueTimeOffset
member.summary: Sets the offset to the cue time.
member.param: The offset to the cue time.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText.SetInBandEnabled
member.param: Specifies whether inband mode is enabled. If TRUE, inband mode is enabled. If FALSE, inband mode is disabled.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedText
member.summary: A timed-text object represents a component of timed text.
